sentence.Network_en: His black eye was a beaut.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: abbreviation of beautyor beautiful

entry.def: You describe someone or something as a beaut when you think they are very good.

means.word_mean: 1. an outstanding example of its kind;

sentences.sentence: "when I make a mistake it's a beaut"
